string.text:
A worn leather wallet for banknotes.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for currency

Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety reasons, but many stalkers keep at least a few rouble in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things like cigarettes.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] universally recognized currency unit
